section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition to announce in number 72-6609 Jimenez against Weinberger and for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the District Court is vacated and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the opinion of this Court.
In Jimenez against Weinberger the first case, I announced, Mr. Rehnquist filed a dissenting opinion, in the second case, 5265, the judgment of the Court is unanimous.
